document_data.name: Ilmeth Waelvur
document_data.mainbody: '''Ilmeth Waelvur''' was a shopkeeper in [[Red Larch]] and a member of the [[Believers]] during the [[Elemental Evil]] crisis.
document_data.Personality: Ilmeth was a hard-drinking and sullen man. He cared nothing for the troubles of others.
document_data.Activities: Ilmeth ran the [[Waelvur's Wagonworks]]. He was one of the Believers, and his objective was to use the group's influence to run his hated rivals of [[Thelorn's Safe Journeys]] out of business.
document_data.History: In [[1491 DR]], one of the carpenters of Ilmeth's shop named Stannor noticed his employer  and some others sometimes disappear into a hidden tunnel. That same year, under secret suggestions from [[Larrakh]] of the [[Cult of Black Earth]], Ilmeth, along with [[Marlandro Gaelkur]] and [[Albaeri Mellikho]], killed some people in order to protect the secret of the Believers. After his crimes were discovered by some adventurers, Ilmeth confessed in tears.
